title: Luxurious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Cleveland
posting_body: ['Luxurious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in Cleveland .', 'Working on removing furniture left by former tenant.', 'Offering an outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large patio.', 'All major utilities included: heat, water, sewer, sanitation and electric.', 'Tenant responsible for phone, cable and internet.', 'Pets allowed.', 'Rent is $635 per month.', 'Rent includes utilities, bills, water, sewer, trash and recycling.', 'The house has a small but complete kitchen, a "family room" no tv, an indoor washer/dryer, and 1 parking space.', 'It is in a lovely quiet neighborhood.', 'Although the house.', 'If you are looking for a comfortable place, this might be the place you are looking for.', 'Smoke free, pet friendly environment.', 'Great neighborhood.', 'Cats OK Dogs with landlord approval.', 'Recently renovated house.', '$710 per month.', 'Off street parking.', 'Utilities, lawn maintenance and snow removal are responsibility of tenant.', 'The neighbor has chickens that are rather loud in the morning and can definitely be heard from your room.', 'If you are interested please text: olivia44844𝐆𝐦𝐚𝐢𝐥com']
